author: blair
msg: * STATUS: Nominate and vote for r18549 and r18550.

author: blair
msg: Educate svn_load_dirs.pl to support symlinks.  Closes issue #2478.

author: blair
msg: svn_load_dirs.pl should not load any .svn or _svn directories, nor any
For all calls to File::Find, in preprocess' anonymous subroutine
argument, filter out any paths that do not match /^[._]svn$/.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: (We know what the activity URL will be, but we don't create it yet; and we
capture the svndiff stream for any changed files to eventually PUT...)
(options_context_t): Declare opaque structure for OPTIONS requests.
(get_options_done_ptr): Fetch a pointer to the options' done boolean (so
we can figure out when it's done).
(added): Perform and parse a basic OPTION request.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Rotate connections when we stall instead of per file.
This achieves a slightly better network distribution such that not all
pipelines tend to stall at the same time.
(finish_report): Rotate the cur_conn after each serf_context_run iteration.
